Trust or not, this game is better than CS:GO. You can customize everything for free : sprays, textures, skins, ... It still has a big community for its age. A good nostalgic game that is still better than newer FPS games (IMO).
It still has the best zombiemods and custom servers. But yea, CS:GO better these days ^^

Malgr√®s le fait qu'il y ai moins de joueurs compar√© √† son prime (pour moi 2011-2014), il reste pour moi LE CS le plus fun de tous.
Plusieurs mode de jeu allant de gungame √† aim, en passant par bhop et xc maps sans oublier les maps Zombie Escape ou Zombie tout court.
Vraiment, mon jeu favori of all time.

-Servers:You can find a lots of server like jailbrake, deathmatch, surf,...But i like to play 1v1 with my friend on empty server

-Graphics:Its little bit outdated but you can play

-Skill:If you played cs 1.6 you will automatically know to play this game (it will be easier for you) but if you are new one, this will be hard game

-Guns:Deagle, awp and ak are the most powerfull guns (only use that guns if you have money)

-Maps:There are few more maps that only appears in cs source but like dust 2 its better textures and annoying barrels

-Community:Sometimes alive

-Rating:9/10 (Its deluxe game for gmod but the game is still good but sadly some servers are dead but you can find servers like jailbrake again)
It's so much fun to laugh with friends and bring back some great moments. I have great affection for it <3
